backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko types for competitions, results, payments, and event comparison helpers used by the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries referencing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for recent fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries of key frontend files for documentation and planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/env.json: Defines environment variables such as the backend canister ID.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Provides Razorpay payment configuration including keyId and theme color.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Manual regression and smoke test checklist covering authentication, competition flow, solve flow, and timers.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings for display.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines React Query cache keys and key factories for API data fetching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app’s router, routes, and global providers including React Query and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: Renders form controls for selecting and configuring competition fee modes, syncing changes upward.
Restricts access to admin-only sections, showing loaders or an access-denied message as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content, requiring authentication and prompting login when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a clickable card summarizing a competition’s status, dates, and event count.
Defines the main app layout with header navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitor names, Ao5, and solve times with navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays the user’s payment history with sorting, loading states, and detailed payment cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a dropdown menu for authenticated users with profile info, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a new user profile, collecting email and display name, and submitting via mutations.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Handles a 15‑second inspection countdown with scramble visibility toggling and callbacks for start and completion.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a post‑solve completion screen with navigation options and instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: A React timer component that starts, updates, and stops a solve timer, reporting the final time to a parent callback.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays an error message when actor initialization fails and provides retry and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay configuration from a runtime JSON file with fallback defaults and caches the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload browser warning when enabled to prevent accidental page exits.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the authenticated user's profile once an actor is available, integrating with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages state and step-by-step simulation for a deployment attempt, including preflight checks and diagnostic logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via React context.
Blocks browser back navigation when enabled by prompting the user to confirm leaving an in-progress solve.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs related to auth, profiles, competitions, payments, and results.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Provides interfaces and logic to compute average-of-five results, handling penalties and DNF conditions.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Utility functions to detect paid competitions and format or extract fee values from pricing modes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to CSV and provides generic CSV generation and download helpers with value escaping.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable dates and date-times using US locale settings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates a multi‑step deployment process with status callbacks and produces detailed error messages.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for environment files, payment config, network connectivity, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay checkout script and opens the payment modal using configuration and order details.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages per‑tab solve session data in sessionStorage, including token and attempt persistence.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds or returns DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and Internet Identity before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Lists all competitions for admins with actions to create, edit, lock, activate, and delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create competitions, validate inputs, configure events, scrambles, and fees.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition, loading data and validating event scrambles and fees.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs deployment preflight checks and step-by-step go-live actions with diagnostics and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard linking to user, competition, results management, and quick actions like creating competitions or deployment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin page to view competition results, filter by event, toggle result visibility, and export results as CSV.
Admin interface to list users, toggle block status, and delete user accounts with confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting or resuming a solve session.
Fetches and lists competitions grouped by status with cards for running, upcoming, and completed events.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a competition leaderboard with event selection, error handling, and competitor navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Provides an authenticated hub listing all competitions with quick navigation to their leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit profile info and access their payment history via tabs.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Displays a public competitor profile with stats and event‑grouped results, with navigation back to leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Controls the solve flow with inspection, timing, session syncing, and refresh recovery for competition attempts.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-side types for result input, public profiles, and summarized user data.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Local extensions of backend types including competitions, results, leaderboards, and session state definitions.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Provides event labels, list of all events, and default event selection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: High-level project snapshot describing features, issues, architecture, and version metadata.
